snippet: Russell Henley’s second straight round of seven-under-par 63 gave him a two-shot lead over Scott Langley and Scott Piercy in the Sony Open.
abstract: Russell Henley takes second-round lead at Sony Open golf tournament in Honolulu; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Henley’s second straight round of seven-under-par 63 gave him a two-shot lead over Scott Langley and Scott Piercy in the Sony Open.

headline.main: PGA Tour Rookie Leads in Honolulu
